name: Rivera-120
parts: Seat + Back : Fabric_OF-12; Middle Part : Fabric_OF-14
description: Unique design with beautiful color contrast Rivera-120 is one of Hatil's amazing collections of mid-level executive chairs that transforms the look of the office. The design is outrageously graceful while exuding warmth, love, and regalia. This chair creates a nurturing and nourishing atmosphere in your relaxation space.Topnotch quality with the perfect materials for a comfortable chairRivera-120 is made of high-quality chrome-plated mild steel. Metal Inert Gas (MIG) welding achieves high quality and durability. Furthermore, cutting and bending are performed with 99.99% accuracy by the most recent Japanese CNC machine. The fabric upholstery is extremely soft, and the cushioning is extremely durable. This classic brand's excellent quality is not an exception. In comparison to all of its notable features, the price of this furniture item is relatively low.

name: Fusion-302
parts: Seat + Back : Fabric_OF-23; Middle Part : Fabric_OF-33
description: This two-seater is one of the most versatile two-seater sofas of HATIL. Users can use it as a two-seater sofa and make it a bed when guests come home. This multi-purpose sofa is a practical solution for a less spacious apartment. With its unique multifunctionality, this sofa will stand out in every living room.Best Quality and Imported Fabri.HAHA uses well-seasoned Beech wood that is imported from Germany. You may choose any of the fabrics from our fabric combinations. The foam that has been used here is also from HATIL's production, which ensures the ultimate comfort.

name: Husky-299
parts: Seat + Back : Fabric_OF-24; Middle Part : Fabric_OF-34
description: This exquisite sofa has a sleek, majestic look to it. The design is outrageously graceful and yet gives off an aura of warmth, love, and regalia. It is willowy and relaxing to sit on, giving you an ambiance of nurturing and nourishment. The soft velvety touch to the skin can peel off your stress from the day and lulls you to relaxation. You can let the thoughts in your head form solid ideas while you comfortably sit here, talk to your loved ones, and do so much more. Most importantly, your home or office will have that elegance vividly present just the way you would always want it. This perfectly fine piece of furniture has a long backbone and only one arm. It presents an “L” shape generally. However, this sofa is available without any armrest too. The side of the sofa that has an arm is slightly bent so that you can rest your arms on it. The curve is not too harsh, just the optimum angle at which you can rest your hand at the utmost comfort. The backside is softly pushed in and one corner of the sofa is a little curved as well. This feature makes it quite easy for you to lean and let go of yourself and get engulfed in calmness. furniture

name: Durham-263
description: You have seen those minimal two-seaters at the corner of any office or a house. You can sit idly on the two-seater and watch tv or divulge in conversations with other people. You can keep your coffee mug on Durham- 263 if you want to while reading your newspaper in the lazy mornings. It is an excellent option for you to pose on while having your photographs clicked too! Most of us are already pretty social media-oriented and love posting our beautiful pictures online. It looks like one slightly larger box accompanied by two smaller rectangular boxes. For your comfort and the sake of the beauty of your home’s interior, it is accompanied by two cushions for the slightly smaller boxes on the sides of the giant box. It is possible to choose your desired fabric from the available options that Hatil has given you. The imported fabric upholstery is soft and exceptionally durable. The option is available for both traditional washing methods and dry cleaning. The design of this item of furniture is modest and minimal while maintaining a touch of elegance. Durham-263 has a moderate weight, good enough to be carried without much help. It comes in excellent quality, environment-friendly Polyurethane (PU) Lacquer in antique finish.
